title: 'Enchanted' - Minecraft 我的世界音乐视频 《着迷》 (Parody)
author: q1814236045
txt_content:
良心制作啊！细节处理比较到位。歌词：Whoa, whoa, whoa
Whoa, whoa, whoa
Whoa, whoa, whoaI’m waking up, I need silk touch
An unbreakable sword, and my bow needs punch.
Tell the villagers, I’m ready to goI’ve got experience , My tables up, I’ve been through forests and the desert’s dust.
This is it, it’s time to level up
WhoaUpgrade my sword, My armor and my bow
I mine and watch my levels grow
I’ve only made it have way, But I’m fightin’ zombays
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, but, Now I’m enchanted, now I’m enchanted.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, but, now I’m enchanted, I’m enchanted.I’ve made my trade, I’ve fought my foes
Given up experience and emeralds.
Mined countless blocks, so I can win
WhoaUnbreaking 2, and sharpness 1, I finally have a sword, that doesn’t suck
This is it, it’s time to level up.
WhoaUpgrade my sword, My armor and my bow
I mine and watch my levels grow
I’ve only made it have way, But I’m fightin’ zombays
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, but, Now I’m enchanted, now I’m enchanted.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, but, now I’m enchanted, I’m enchanted.All night I’ve fought, I still haven’t died
Thanks to my tools, I feel enchanted all the timeUpgrade my sword, My armor and my bow
I mine and watch my levels grow
I’ve only made it have way, But I’m fightin’ zombays
Welcome to the new age, to the new age
Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, but, Now I’m enchanted, now I’m enchanted.
